cheapen.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to become or make something become lower in price or value
cheapen.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: The good harvest that year cheapened the costs of some raw materials.
cheapen.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to make something or someone seem less deserving of respect
cheapen.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: She never compromised or cheapened herself.
